<style>
    .header-container {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        width: 100%;
        padding: 15px 30px;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1000;
    }

    .header-content {
        max-width: 1400px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .logo-container {
        flex: 0 0 auto;
    }

    .logo-image {
        height: 60px;
        width: auto;
        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
    }

    .logo-image:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }

    .nav-container {
        flex: 1;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: flex-end;
    }

    .nav-list {
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        display: flex;
        gap: 40px;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .nav-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        padding: 8px 0;
        position: relative;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    .nav-link:after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        width: 0;
        height: 2px;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        background-color: #00FF00;
        transition: width 0.3s ease;
    }

    .nav-link:hover:after {
        width: 100%;
    }

    /* Dropdown Styles */
    .dropdown {
        position: relative;
    }

    .dropdown-content {
        display: none;
        position: absolute;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        min-width: 220px;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.15);
        border-radius: 4px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2);
        top: 100%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        padding: 8px 0;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1002;
    }

    .dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {
        display: block;
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .dropdown-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        padding: 12px 20px;
        display: block;
        font-size: 15px;
        font-weight: 500;
        text-align: left;
        white-space: nowrap;
        transition: all 0.2s ease;
    }

    .dropdown-link:hover {
        background-color: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        padding-left: 25px;
    }

    .submenu {
        left: 100%;
        top: -8px;
        transform: none;
    }

    .dropdown:hover > .dropdown-content.submenu {
        display: block;
    }

    /* Mobile Menu Toggle */
    .menu-toggle {
        display: none;
        background: none;
        border: none;
        cursor: pointer;
        padding: 5px;
        margin-left: 10px;
        z-index: 1003;
    }

    .menu-toggle span {
        display: block;
        width: 25px;
        height: 3px;
        margin: 5px 0;
        background: #00FF00;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    /* Responsive Styles */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .nav-list {
            gap: 30px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 10px 20px;
        }
        .menu-toggle {
            display: block;
        }
        .nav-container {
            position: fixed; /* Changed from absolute to fixed */
            top: 80px;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: max-height 0.5s ease;
            z-index: 1001;
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        }
        .nav-container.active {
            max-height: 85vh; /* Limit height to prevent overflow issues */
            overflow-y: auto;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        .nav-list {
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
            width: 100%;
            padding: 20px;
            gap: 15px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 16px;
            width: 100%;
            display: block;
            padding: 10px 0;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Remove underline animation for mobile */
        .nav-link:after {
            display: none;
        }
        /* Add explicit plus indicator for dropdowns */
        .dropdown > .nav-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown.active > .nav-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        .dropdown-content {
            position: static;
            width: 100%;
            transform: none;
            border: none;
            box-shadow: none;
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            opacity: 1;
            display: block;
            padding: 0;
            margin-left: 15px;
            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        .dropdown.active .dropdown-content {
            max-height: 1000px;
            padding: 8px 0;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            position: relative;
        }
        /* Style submenu dropdowns in mobile */
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link {
            padding-right: 30px; /* Space for plus indicator */
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '+';
            position: absolute;
            right: 10px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown-content .dropdown.active > .dropdown-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        /* Fix submenu position */
        .submenu {
            position: static;
            margin-left: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 8px 15px; /* Reduce padding for smaller screens */
        }
        .header-content {
            flex-direction: row;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .logo-image {
            height: 45px;
        }
        .nav-container {
            top: 62px; /* Adjust based on header height */
        }
        /* Better spacing for dropdown items */
        .dropdown-content {
            margin-left: 10px;
        }
        .dropdown-link {
            padding: 12px 10px;
        }
    }

    /* Add margin to page content to prevent header overlap */
    body {
        padding-top: 90px;
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        body {

<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
        const navContainer = document.querySelector('.nav-container');
        const dropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown');
        
        // Toggle mobile menu
        menuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
            navContainer.classList.toggle('active');
            // Prevent body scrolling when menu is open
            document.body.style.overflow = navContainer.classList.contains('active') ? 'hidden' : '';
        });
        
        // Handle dropdowns on mobile
        dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
            const link = dropdown.querySelector('.nav-link, .dropdown-link');
            link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                    if (dropdown.classList.contains('dropdown') && 
                        dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-content')) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent event bubbling
                        
                        // Close other same-level dropdowns
                        const parentUl = dropdown.parentNode;
                        const siblings = parentUl.querySelectorAll(':scope > .dropdown');
                        siblings.forEach(sibling => {
                            if (sibling !== dropdown) {
                                sibling.classList.remove('active');
                            }
                        });
                        
                        dropdown.classList.toggle('active');
                    }
                }
            });
        });
        
        // Close menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768 && 
                !navContainer.contains(e.target) && 
                !menuToggle.contains(e.target) && 
                navContainer.classList.contains('active')) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
        
        // Update menu behavior on window resize
        window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
                    dropdown.classList.remove('active');
                });
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
    });
</script>

class="custom-code-container ccustom-code-lsdK71D3pa"><style>
    /* Remove default body margins and padding */
    body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        width: 100%;
        overflow-x: hidden;  /* Prevent horizontal scrolling */
    }

    /* Updated events-showcase to full width */
    .events-showcase {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 100%;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        background-color: black;
        color: white;
    }

    /* Main header */
    .main-header {
        text-align: center;
        margin-bottom: 2rem;
        padding: 2rem 1rem;
    }

    .milestone-text {
        color: #7FFF00;
        font-family: 'Meow Script', cursive;
        text-transform: none;
        font-size: 5rem;
        margin: 0;
        line-height: 1.2;
        font-weight: normal;
    }

    /* Updated event-item styling for consistency */
    .event-item {
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
        aspect-ratio: 1/1;  /* Square aspect ratio for consistency */
        background: black;
        border-radius: 8px;  /* Adds slight rounding to corners */
        box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);  /* Subtle shadow for depth */
    }

    /* Adjust feature size and positioning */
    .feature {
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
        aspect-ratio: 16/9;
        margin-top: 2rem;
        max-width: 80%;
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: auto;
        background: black;
        border-radius: 8px;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
    }

    /* Update grid layouts with consistent spacing */
    .events-grid {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 2rem;  /* Increased gap between sections */
        margin: 2rem auto;
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 90%;
        padding: 0 1rem;  /* Added padding for better edge spacing */
    }

    .row {
        display: grid;
        gap: 1rem;  /* Consistent gap between items */
        margin-bottom: 2rem;  /* Space between rows */
        align-items: stretch;  /* Ensure all items stretch to match */
    }

    /* Specific row layouts */
    .quad-row {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
    }

    .triple-row {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
    }

    /* Links & images */
    .event-item a,
    .feature a {
        display: flex;
        height: 100%;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        text-decoration: none;
        color: white;
    }

    /* Image styling */
    .event-item img,
    .feature img {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        object-fit: cover;
        transition: all 0.5s ease;
    }

    /* Special handling for sections with people */
    .triple-row .event-item img {
        object-position: center 15%;  /* Default position adjustment for triple rows */
    }

    /* Emmy The Owl specific adjustments */
    .row.triple-row:nth-of-type(8) .event-item img,  /* Emmy The Owl section */
    .triple-row.has-section-overlay:nth-of-type(8) .event-item img {
        object-position: center 25%;  /* Better position to show owl mascot head */
    }

    /* Add emmy-owl-section class for better targeting */
    .emmy-owl-section .event-item img {
        object-position: center 30%;  /* Default position for Emmy section */
    }

    /* Dripping in Confidence section adjustments */
    .row.quad-row:nth-of-type(3) .event-item img {  /* Dripping in Confidence section */
        object-position: center 20%;  /* Default position for all images in this section */
    }

    .row.quad-row:nth-of-type(3) .event-item:nth-child(3) img,
    .row.quad-row:nth-of-type(3) .event-item:nth-child(4) img {
        object-position: center 10%;  /* Specific adjustment for right two images */
    }

    /* Class-based targeting for Dripping in Confidence */
    .dripping-confidence-section .event-item img {
        object-position: center 20%;  /* Default position for all images in this section */
    }

    .dripping-confidence-section .event-item:nth-child(3) img,
    .dripping-confidence-section .event-item:nth-child(4) img {
        object-position: center 10%;  /* Specific adjustment for right two images */
    }

    /* Section-specific adjustments */
    .triple-row.has-section-overlay:nth-of-type(9) .event-item img {  /* School Events section */
        object-position: center 25%;
    }

    /* Event title overlay */
    .event-title {
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        padding: 1rem;
        background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(0,0,0,0.8), transparent);
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(20px);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    .event-title h2, 
    .event-title h3 {
        margin: 0;
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
    }

    .event-title p {
        margin: 5px 0 0 0;
        font-size: 1rem;
    }

    /* Hover effect - combination of zoom and brighten */
    .event-item:hover img,
    .feature:hover img {
        transform: scale(1.05);  /* Reduced scale for more subtle effect */
        filter: brightness(110%);
    }
    .event-item:hover .event-title,
    .feature:hover .event-title {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }

    /* Updated responsive layout */
    @media (max-width: 1200px) {
        .quad-row {
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 992px) {
        .quad-row,
        .triple-row {
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
        }
        
        .events-grid {
            max-width: 95%;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 576px) {
        .quad-row,
        .triple-row {
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        }
        
        .events-grid {
            gap: 1rem;
            padding: 0 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .row {
            gap: 0.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        
        .feature {
            max-width: 100%;
        }
    }

    /* Update slideshow styling for better image display */
    .anniversary-showcase {
        position: relative;
        width: 100%;
        aspect-ratio: 16/9;  /* Standard widescreen ratio */
        overflow: hidden;
        margin-bottom: 2rem;
        background: black;
    }

    .slide img {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        object-fit: contain;  /* Changed to contain to prevent cropping */
        object-position: center;
        background: black;
    }

    /* Import custom fonts */
    @font-face {
        font-family: 'Amsterdam Three';
        src: url('path-to-your-font/AmsterdamThree.ttf') format('truetype');
    }
    @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Meow+Script&display=swap');

    /* Contact us button styling */
    .contact-us-button {
        text-align: center;
        margin: 2rem 0;
        padding: 0 1rem;
    }
    .contact-us-button a {
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        padding: 1.5rem;
        font-size: 1.8rem;
        color: #fff;
        background-color: #7FFF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: bold;
        border-radius: 8px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(127, 255, 0, 0.3);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-align: center;
    }
    .contact-us-button a:hover {
        background-color: #5cbf00;
        box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(127,255,0,0.6),
                    0 0 60px rgba(127,255,0,0.4),
                    0 0 90px rgba(127,255,0,0.2);
        transform: scale(1.02);
        text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255,255,255,0.8);
        letter-spacing: 2px;
    }

    /* Section Headers */
    .section-header {
        text-align: center;
        margin: 2rem 0 1rem;
        padding: 0.5rem;
    }

    .section-header h2 {
        color: #7FFF00;
        font-size: 2.5rem;
        margin: 0;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: bold;
        text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(127,255,0,0.5),
                     0 0 20px rgba(127,255,0,0.3);
        letter-spacing: 2px;
    }

    /* Adjust spacing between sections */
    .row {
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
    }

    /* Update responsive layout */
    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .section-header h2 {
            font-size: 2rem;
        }
    }

    /* Add to existing CSS */
    .fade-in {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(20px);
        transition: opacity 0.6s ease-out, transform 0.6s ease-out;
    }

    .fade-in.visible {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }

    /* Add this to all existing row classes to enable fade-in */
    .row {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(20px);
        transition: opacity 0.6s ease-out, transform 0.6s ease-out;
    }

    .row.visible {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }

    /* Add these new styles for the section overlays */
    .section-overlay {
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        padding: 2rem;
        background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(0,0,0,0.8), transparent);
        z-index: 2;
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateY(20px);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    .section-overlay h3 {
        font-size: 2.5rem;
        margin: 0;
        text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
        color: white;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .row:hover .section-overlay {
        opacity: 1;
        transform: translateY(0);
    }

    /* Hide individual event titles when using section overlay */
    .has-section-overlay .event-title {
        display: none;
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .section-overlay h3 {
            font-size: 1.8rem;
        }
    }

    /* Add these styles for the slideshow functionality */
    .slideshow {
        position: relative;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
    }

    .slide {
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 1.5s ease-in-out;
    }

    .slide.active {
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .anniversary-title {
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        padding: 2rem;
        background: linear-gradient(to top, rgba(0,0,0,0.8), transparent);
        z-index: 2;
    }

    .anniversary-title h2 {
        font-size: 3rem;
        margin: 0;
        text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
        color: white;
        text-align: center;
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .anniversary-title h2 {
            font-size: 2rem;
        }
    }

    /* Website link styling */
    .website-link {
        text-align: center;
        margin: 2rem 0;
        padding: 1rem;
        font-size: 1.5rem;
    }
    .website-link a {
        color: #7FFF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: bold;
    }

    /* Add specific class for Sensory Friendly section */
    .sensory-friendly-section {
        grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);  /* Force 2 columns */
        max-width: 80%;  /* Make the row narrower */
        margin-left: auto;
        margin-right: auto;
    }

    .sensory-friendly-section .event-item {
        margin: 0 auto;  /* Center items */
        max-width: 90%;  /* Limit image width */
    }

    /* Responsive adjustments for sensory section */
    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .sensory-friendly-section {
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);  /* Keep 2 columns on medium screens */
            max-width: 100%;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 576px) {
        .sensory-friendly-section {
            grid-template-columns: 1fr;  /* Single column on very small screens */
        }
    }
</style>

<script>
    // Intersection Observer for fade-in effect
    const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
                entry.target.classList.add('visible');
            }
        });
    }, {
        threshold: 0.1
    });

    // Observe all rows
    document.querySelectorAll('.row').forEach((row) => {
        observer.observe(row);
    });

    // Add this to your existing script section
    function startSlideshow() {
        const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.slide');
        let currentSlide = 0;
        
        function nextSlide() {
            slides[currentSlide].classList.remove('active');
            currentSlide = (currentSlide + 1) % slides.length;
            slides[currentSlide].classList.add('active');
        }

        // Change slide every 5 seconds
        setInterval(nextSlide, 5000);
    }

    // Start the slideshow when the page loads
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', startSlideshow);
</script>
